item.description: Hey! Proposed by several members, meet-up Saturday, October 17th at 11:00a at Stodders Neck Park in Hingham, MA! Visit Stodders Neck's website for location and directions! Trails, beach and should-be beautiful foliage! Bring your well-behaved bullies and other pooches for some off-leash play and trail walking with other enthusiasts! Any talented photographers out there? Please take some pictures for our official website, www.newenglandbullybreedclub.com! Also, visit us on our NEBBC's fan page on Facebook to post your pooch and chat with other members! Questions, comments, suggestions? POST ON FACEBOOK or email your organizer, Cassie-Leigh Stock (President, NEBBC) at JustCassie101@comcast.net! Thank you, and we hope to see you there :)
item.name: Play Date & Trail-Walking at Stodders Neck Park!
